类 Wasp

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp21.domain.actor.Actor
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp21.domain.actor.Enemy
Wasp
public class Wasp
extends Enemy
A new actor, bug that moves through the maze and tries to eat Chap. The logic of this actor, and how it is rendered is defined.
作者:
Rae 300535154 & Nathanael 300478745
